meanings.definition: A boy or young man who performs household tasks or chores.
meanings.sent1: The choreboy helped his mother with the dishes after dinner.
meanings.sent2: The choreboy swept the floor every morning before school.
meanings.sent3: The choreboy accidentally mixed up the laundry and turned all the clothes pink!
meanings.sent4: The choreboy's dedication to his work shone brighter than the sun.
meanings.sent5: The choreboy's cheerful attitude made even the toughest chores seem easy.

meanings.definition: A small scrubbing pad used for cleaning.
meanings.sent1: She used a choreboy to scrub the stubborn stains off the dishes.
meanings.sent2: The choreboy was perfect for cleaning the bathtub.
meanings.sent3: The choreboy looked like a tiny green sponge, ready to tackle any mess.
meanings.sent4: The choreboy's rough texture made grime disappear like magic.
meanings.sent5: The choreboy's effectiveness in cleaning surprised everyone in the household.
